import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Navbar, Dialog } from '../components' import "../assets/style/gameRoom.css" export default function GameRoom(){ const [ showRole, setShowRole ] = useState(true) const partyMemberShip = "Liberal" const Role = () => { return <> {showRole &&
setShowRole(false)}>

Adolf Hitler

{partyMemberShip}

} } return <>
Hello World
setShowRole(!showRole)} > Show role
{showRole && } }
